original_text: That is how Naomi returned from Moab with Ruth. Ruth was from Moab. She was the wife of Naomi's son Mahlon. Naomi and Ruth arrived in Bethlehem when the harvest of barley was beginning.
korean_text: 나오미가 모압 지방에서 그의 며느리 모압 여인 룻과 함께 돌아왔는데 그들이 보리 추수 시작할 때에 베들레헴에 이르렀더라

sentences.original_text: That is how Naomi returned from Moab with Ruth.
sentences.korean_translation: 나오미가 룻과 함께 모압에서 돌아온 것입니다.

sentences.original_text: She was the wife of Naomi's son Mahlon.
Naomi and Ruth arrived in Bethlehem
when the harvest of barley was beginning.
